Class Decrypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • Decrypt

  • public class Decrypt
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods to crack a puzzle either with brute force or with a key

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • cracking

        public static byte[] cracking(byte[] ciphertext)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Takes a puzzle as a byte array, creates a key and then tries to open the puzzle. The return type will be null if the key is the wrong size, or the start of the decrypted puzzle does not equal 16 bytes of 0's. If it is the right size it will return a decrypted puzzle in the form of a byte array.
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - A that is to be cracked
        Returns:
        A byte array or null based on the key being tried
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • decrypting

        public java.lang.String decrypting(java.lang.String encyptedMsg,
                                   javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        A method that opens a encrypted message using a secret key and returns the decrypted message.
        Parameters:
        encyptedMsg - A encrypted message that is to be cracked
        SecretKey - A secret key that will open the message
        Returns:
        A decrypted message string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
